description: Master advanced Tally features including Data Export/Import, Connected Features, Payroll Management, and TallyPrime Customization

slides.title: Welcome to Tally Advanced Features
slides.content:
# Tally Advanced Features

Take your Tally skills to expert level with **advanced features** for efficiency and automation.

## What You Will Learn

- **Data Export/Import** - Move data efficiently
- **Connected Features** - Online capabilities
- **Payroll Management** - Employee salary processing
- **Customization** - Tailoring Tally to your needs

## Advanced Capabilities

| Feature | Benefit |
|---------|--------|
| Auto Backup | Data protection |
| Remote Access | Work anywhere |
| Bank Integration | Direct feeds |
| Payroll | Complete HR |
| TDL | Customization |

slides.title: Data Export Options
slides.content:
# Exporting Data from Tally

## Export Formats

| Format | Use Case |
|--------|----------|
| Excel | Analysis, sharing |
| PDF | Reports, printing |
| XML | Data exchange |
| JSON | API integration |

## Exporting Reports

**Path:** Any Report > Alt+E (Export)

```
Format: Excel
File Name: report.xlsx
Location: Desktop
```

## Export to Excel

1. Open any report
2. Press Alt+E or Ctrl+E
3. Select Excel format
4. Choose location
5. Export

## Masters Export

**Path:** Gateway > Export > Masters

- Ledgers
- Stock Items
- Groups
- Godowns

slides.title: Data Import
slides.content:
# Importing Data into Tally

## Import Methods

| Method | Source |
|--------|--------|
| Excel Import | Spreadsheet data |
| XML Import | Tally format |
| Bank Statement | Transactions |

## Excel Import Steps

1. Prepare Excel template
2. Fill in data
3. Gateway > Import
4. Select file
5. Map columns
6. Import

## Template Format

```
| Name | Under | Opening Bal |
|------|-------|-------------|
| ABC Ltd | Sundry Debtors | 50000 |
| XYZ Inc | Sundry Creditors | 30000 |
```

## Common Imports

- Ledger masters
- Stock items
- Opening balances
- Transactions

## Import Validation

- Check for duplicates
- Verify parent groups
- Validate amounts

slides.title: Tally Connected Features
slides.content:
# Connected Features

## What are Connected Features?

Online capabilities that connect Tally to external services.

## Key Connected Features

| Feature | Purpose |
|---------|--------|
| GST Direct | File returns from Tally |
| E-Way Bill | Generate online |
| E-Invoice | Generate IRN |
| Bank Feeds | Auto bank import |

## Enabling Connected Features

**Path:** Gateway > F11 > Connect

```
Enable Connected Features: Yes
Tally.NET ID: [Your ID]
```

## GST Direct Filing

1. Prepare return
2. Verify data
3. Connect to GST portal
4. File directly from Tally

## E-Invoice Generation

1. Create sales invoice
2. Generate IRN
3. Get QR code
4. Print with IRN

slides.title: Remote Access
slides.content:
# Tally Remote Access

## Remote Features

| Feature | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| Tally.NET | Cloud connectivity |
| Remote Users | Access from anywhere |

**F11 > Connect**

```
Enable Remote Access: Yes

```

## Access Methods

### Browser Access
- Access reports via browser
- View data anywhere
- Limited editing

### Tally Remote
- Full Tally features
- Works like desktop
- Requires subscription

## Security

| Control | Purpose |
|---------|--------|
| User Rights | Function access |
| IP Restriction | Location limits |
| Audit Log | Track activity |

slides.title: Payroll Setup
slides.content:
# Payroll in Tally

## Enabling Payroll

**F11 > Statutory Features**

```
Maintain Payroll: Yes
Process Payroll Statutory: Yes
```

## Payroll Components

### Employee Master

```
Employee: John Smith
Designation: Manager
Department: Sales
Date of Joining: 01-Apr-2020
```

### Pay Heads

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Earnings | Basic, HRA, Allowances |
| Deductions | PF, ESI, TDS |

## Creating Pay Heads

**Path:** Gateway > Create > Pay Head

```
Name: Basic Pay
Pay Head Type: Earnings
Computation: As User Defined Value
```

## Employee Groups

- Managers
- Staff
- Workers
- Contract

slides.title: Salary Processing
slides.content:
# Processing Payroll

## Salary Structure

```
Basic Pay:       Rs. 25,000
HRA:             Rs. 10,000
Conveyance:      Rs. 3,000
Special Allow:   Rs. 7,000
----------------------------
Gross Salary:    Rs. 45,000

Deductions:
PF (12%):        Rs. 3,000
ESI (0.75%):     Rs. 338
TDS:             Rs. 2,000
----------------------------
Net Salary:      Rs. 39,662
```

## Payroll Voucher Entry

**Path:** Gateway > Vouchers > Payroll

```
Employee: John Smith
Pay Period: March 2024

[Earnings auto-calculated]
[Deductions auto-calculated]
```

## Attendance

**Path:** Gateway > Transaction > Payroll > Attendance

```
Employee: John Smith
Days Present: 26
Days Absent: 2
Paid Leave: 2
```

slides.title: Statutory Compliance
slides.content:

slides.title: Data Backup and Recovery
slides.content:
# Data Protection

## Backup Options

| Type | When |
|------|------|
| Manual | On demand |
| Auto | Scheduled |
| Cloud | Tally Vault |

## Manual Backup

**Path:** Alt+F3 > Backup

```
Company: ABC Traders
Destination: D:\Backup
Include Company Data: Yes
```

## Auto Backup

**F11 > Configure**

```
Enable Auto Backup: Yes
Frequency: Daily
Time: End of Day
Location: External Drive
```

## Restore

**Path:** Alt+F3 > Restore

1. Select backup file
2. Choose location
3. Confirm restore

## Best Practices

- Daily backups
- Multiple locations
- Test restores
- Label clearly

slides.title: Data Split and Merge
slides.content:
# Managing Data

## Split Company Data

**Path:** Alt+F3 > Split Company Data

**Why Split?**
- Performance improvement
- Year-wise separation
- Manageable file size

### Split by Date

```
Split Date: 31-Mar-2023
New Company: ABC 2022-23
Current: ABC 2023-24
```

## Merge Companies

**Path:** Alt+F3 > Merge Companies

**Use Cases:**
- Combine branches
- Migration
- Consolidation

### Merge Steps

1. Select source company
2. Select destination
3. Map masters
4. Execute merge

## Data Optimization

- Rewrite data
- Remove unused masters
- Archive old data

slides.title: Security and Audit
slides.content:
# Security Features

## User Access Control

```
Owner: Full access
Admin: Most functions
Data Entry: Entry only
View Only: Reports only
```

## Security Levels

| Control | Purpose |
|---------|--------|
| Password | Company access |
| User Rights | Function limits |
| Date Limits | Period control |

## Tally Vault

Encrypt company data:

```
Alt+F3 > Tally Vault
Password: [Strong password]
```

## Edit Log

**Tally Prime Edit Log**

- Track all changes
- Who changed what
- When changed
- Old vs new values

## Audit Trail

- Document changes
- User activity
- System access
- Compliance ready

slides.title: TDL Customization
slides.content:
# TDL - Tally Definition Language

## What is TDL?

Programming language to **customize Tally** behavior and appearance.

## TDL Capabilities

| Feature | Example |
|---------|--------|
| Reports | Custom formats |
| Fields | Additional data |
| Validations | Business rules |
| Print | Invoice designs |

## Simple TDL Example

```
[Field: Custom Field]
Set as: "Custom Value"
Modify: Report Name
```

## Adding TDL Files

**Path:** Gateway > F11 > TDL

```
Load TDL Files: Yes
List of TDL: custom.tdl
```

## Common Customizations

- Invoice formats
- Report layouts
- Field additions
- Validation rules

## TDL Sources

- Tally Marketplace
- Certified developers
- Custom development

**Path:** Banking > Bank Reconciliation

2. Import into Tally
3. Auto-match transactions
4. Reconcile differences

## Auto Reconciliation

```

Unmatched: 5 transactions

Manual Review Required:
- Check 456: Rs. 5,000
- Transfer: Rs. 10,000
```

**Connected Features**

- Direct payments
- Payment links
- Collection tracking

| CSV | Universal |
| OFX | Standard |

slides.title: Troubleshooting
slides.content:
# Common Issues

## Data Issues

| Problem | Solution |
|---------|----------|
| Data corruption | Rewrite data |
| Slow performance | Split company |
| Login issues | Reset password |

## Rewrite Data

**Path:** Ctrl+Alt+R

- Fixes minor corruption
- Optimizes data
- Run periodically

## Common Errors

### Company Not Loading

1. Check data folder
2. Verify permissions
3. Rewrite if needed

### Report Not Printing

1. Check printer setup
2. Verify print configuration
3. Update drivers

### GST Mismatch

1. Verify party GSTIN
2. Check state codes
3. Validate HSN/SAC
